long_description: Built with moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric and a supportive close-to-skin fit, the Sugoi Jackie shorts for women offer support for hard-working muscles while running and training. Nylon/spandex fabric has a soft matte surface and provides a firm, supportive fit. Supportive mesh panel behind thighs are blended with spandex for excellent stretch, recovery and breathability. Inner key pocket and zippered back pocket store small running essentials. Flat waistband features 1.5 in., moisture-wicking supportive elastic waist to secure the fit without binding. The Sugoi Jackie shorts for women feature flatlock seams to reduce chafing. Closeout.
short_description: Built with moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric and a supportive close-to-skin fit, the Sugoi Jackie shorts for women offer support for hard-working muscles while running and training.
